pkgmetadata.longdescription: # iblutil![CI workflow](https://github.com/int-brain-lab/iblrplate/actions/workflows/main.yaml/badge.svg?branch=main)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/int-brain-lab/iblrplate/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://coveralls.io/github/int-brain-lab/iblrplate?branch=main)Small utilities with minimal dependencies, tests run on Python v3.8
